required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-Center Evaluation of the Anti-Inflammatory Effects of Lastacaft as Measured by In-Vivo Confocal Microscopy

brief_summary.textblock: A Single-Center Evaluation of the Anti-Inflammatory Effects of Lastacaft ® as Measured by In-Vivo Confocal Microscopy

primary_outcome.measure: Conjunctival Inflammation at 1 Hour (+30 Minutes) Post CAC on Day 1
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (+30 minutes) post CAC on Day 1
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival Inflammation was assessed by a trained technician post-conjunctival allergen challenge (CAC) on a 0 to 4 scale (0 = best [least inflammation] and 4 = worst [most inflammation]). The Conjunctival Inflammation was averaged across all Lastacaft-treated eyes to create the average Lastacaft eye Conjunctival Inflammation score, and the Conjunctival Inflammation score was averaged across all Tears Naturale-treated eyes to create the average Tears Naturale eye Conjunctival Inflammation score.

primary_outcome.measure: Conjunctival Inflammation 1 Hour (+30 Minutes) Post CAC on Day 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (+30 minutes) post CAC on Day 2
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival Inflammation was assessed by a trained technician post-conjunctival allergen challenge (CAC) on a 0 to 4 scale (0 = best [least inflammation] and 4 = worst [most inflammation]). The Conjunctival Inflammation was averaged across all Lastacaft-treated eyes to create the average Lastacaft eye Conjunctival Inflammation score, and the Conjunctival Inflammation score was averaged across all Tears Naturale-treated eyes to create the average Tears Naturale eye Conjunctival Inflammation score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Ocular Itching on Day 1 (15 Minutes Post-study Medication Instillation)
secondary_outcome.description: CAC was performed 15 minutes after study medication instillation. Ocular Itching was assessed by the patient on a 0-4 scale (0 = best [no itching] to 4 = worst [severe itching]). The ocular itching score was averaged across all Lastacaft-treated eyes to create the average Lastacaft eye ocular itching score, and the ocular itching score was averaged across all Tears Naturale-treated eyes to create the average Tears Naturale eye ocular itching score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Ocular Itching on Day 2 (15 Minutes Post-study Medication Instillation)
secondary_outcome.description: CAC was performed 15 minutes after study medication instillation. Ocular Itching was assessed by the patient on a 0-4 scale (0 = best [no itching] to 4 = worst [severe itching]). The ocular itching score was averaged across all Lastacaft-treated eyes to create the average Lastacaft eye ocular itching score, and the ocular itching score was averaged across all Tears Naturale-treated eyes to create the average Tears Naturale eye ocular itching score.

arm_group.description: One drop Lastacaft ® in right eye or left eye based on randomization list once on Day 1 and once on Day 2
One drop Tears Naturale ® in right eye or left eye based on randomization list once on Day 1 and once on Day 2

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Have a positive history of ocular allergies and a positive skin test to protocol defined allergens
- Have a positive CAC reaction at Visit 1
- Have a positive conjunctival inflammation score at Visit 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- May not use disallowed medications in specified washout period
- May not have an ocular or system disease the investigator feels with impact subject safety or trial parameters
- May not have active ocular infection

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Subjects were recruited from one site in the US.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Twenty-five participants enrolled and completed the study. Participant flow and baseline characteristics are presented for the 25 subjects (50 participant eyes) that met all inclusion criteria, none of the exclusion criteria and were randomized to receive Lastacaft ® in one eye (25 participant eyes) and Tears Naturale ® (25 participant eyes) in the other based on the randomization list.

group.title: Lastacaft ®
group.description: One drop Lastacaft ® in right eye or left eye based on randomization list once on Day 1 and once on Day 2. If the right eye was selected for Lastacaft ® at Day 1, the right eye also received Lastacaft ® at Day 2 as dosing did not change between days.

group.title: Tears Naturale ® (Placebo)
group.description: One drop Tears Naturale® (Placebo) in right eye or left eye based on randomization list once on Day 1 and once on Day 2. If the right eye was selected for Tears Naturale® (Placebo) at Day 1, the right eye also received Tears Naturale® (Placebo) at Day 2 as dosing did not change between days.

participants_list.participants: 25 participants received one drop of Lastacaft in one eye and Tears Naturale in the other eye.

baseline.population: A total of 25 participants enrolled in the study. Since each subject had 1 Lastacaft ® eye and 1 Tears Naturale® eye, the baseline analysis is based on the number of eyes in each arm.

group.title: Lastacaft ® Eyes
group.description: One drop Lastacaft ® in right eye or left eye based on randomization list once on Day 1 and once on Day 2. If the right eye was selected for Lastacaft ® at Day 1, the right eye also received Lastacaft ® at Day 2 as dosing did not change between days.

group.title: Tears Naturale® Eyes
group.description: One drop Tears Naturale® (Placebo) in right eye or left eye based on randomization list once on Day 1 and once on Day 2. If the right eye was selected for Tears Naturale® (Placebo) at Day 1, the right eye also received Tears Naturale® (Placebo) at Day 2 as dosing did not change between days

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Conjunctival Inflammation at 1 Hour (+30 Minutes) Post CAC on Day 1
outcome.description: Conjunctival Inflammation was assessed by a trained technician post-conjunctival allergen challenge (CAC) on a 0 to 4 scale (0 = best [least inflammation] and 4 = worst [most inflammation]). The Conjunctival Inflammation was averaged across all Lastacaft-treated eyes to create the average Lastacaft eye Conjunctival Inflammation score, and the Conjunctival Inflammation score was averaged across all Tears Naturale-treated eyes to create the average Tears Naturale eye Conjunctival Inflammation score.
outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (+30 minutes) post CAC on Day 1
outcome.population: All Randomized Participants Population - All participants who received study treatment

group.title: Lastacaft®
group.description: Participants received one drop of Lastacaft® or Tears Naturale ® (Placebo) in right eye and one drop of the other treatment in the left eye once on Day 1 based on the randomization list. (participants that received Lastacaft ® in one eye received Tears Naturale® in the other eye at the same time). If the right eye was selected for Lastacaft ® at Day 1, the right eye also received Lastacaft ® at Day 2 as dosing did not change between days.

group.title: Tears Naturale ® (Placebo)
group.description: Participants received one drop of Lastacaft® or Tears Naturale ® (Placebo) in right eye and one drop of the other treatment in the left eye once on Day 1 based on the randomization list. (participants that received Tears Naturale ® in one eye received Lastacaft® in the other eye at the same time). If the right eye was selected for Lastacaft ® at Day 1, the right eye also received Lastacaft ® at Day 2 as dosing did not change between days.

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse events were collected through study completion, an average of 5 days. All subjects who received study medication were evaluable for the safety analysis.
reported_events.desc: Throughout the visits, staff collected all Adverse Events reported, elicited, or observed.

group.title: Lastacaft®
group.description: Participants received one drop of Lastacaft® or Tears Naturale ® (Placebo) in right eye and one drop of Lastacaft® or Tears Naturale ® (Placebo) in left eye based on the randomization list. (participants that received Lastacaft ® in one eye received Tears Naturale® in the other eye at the same time)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There IS an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
